content: / 2 inches less than desired foot length i recommend ending row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before your last turn having worked row 4 or 8 of the jasmine ssk using 1 st from each side of the gap k1 pattern turn if you are using a contrast colour for the toe row 4 ws s1 p to 1 st before your last turn break yarn here and start working with your p2tog using 1 st from each side of the gap contrast colour now p1 turn toe repeats row 3-4 until all stitches have been worked set up round k28 32 36 pm knit to end you will have 18 20 22 sts on your needle of round and the rs should be facing you round 1 k1 ssk k to 2 sts before marker gusset k2tog sm k1 ssk k to 2 sts before end of round k2tog now you are going to start working in the round 2 k to end of round round again set up round this will be your bor place a repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 20 28 marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and 36 sts left k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap break cut your working yarn leaving a tail of contrast yarn and start working with main approximately 38 cm 15 inches now you colour yarn here pick up 1 extra st in the can kitchener stitch your toe closed ladder from the row below and k tbl pm k 2 3 jasmine socks by debbie ford abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together sl1 k2tog psso slip next stitch knit 2 together then pass slipped stitch over knit knit pm place marker k tbl knit through back loop bor beginning of round purl purl sm slip marker ssk slip slip knit nb slip your sts purlwise yo yarn over jasmine pattern charts small medium and large 4 jasmine socks by debbie ford written instructions jasmine pattern medium and large small row 1 knit 30 sts row 1 knit 24 sts row 2 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo k3 × 5 row 2 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo k3 × 4 row 3 - 4 k1 p1 k5 × 4 p1 k4 row 3 -4 k1 p1 k5 × 3 p1 k4 row 5 knit row 5 knit row 6 k3 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo × 5 row 6 k3 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo × 4 row 7 - 8 k4 p1 k5 × 4 p1 k1 row 7 - 8 k4 p1 k5 × 3 p1 k1 thanks to polly thomas for the copy i would love to see your finished projects please share on instagram or ravelry @daisystitches #debbieforddesigns dinkydebbie 5 jasmine socks by debbie ford
